name: HUNTS - OS Credential Dumping (T1003)
description: Hunts for non-Windows processes accessing the lsass.exe process, which can be indicative of credential dumping

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: @timestamp:{ {{vars.elasticHuntStart}} TO {{vars.elasticHuntEnd}} } AND event_type:"sysmon" AND event_id:"10" AND event_data.TargetImage:"C:\\Windows\\system32\\lsass.exe"
